thread.title: Ground News - West condemns Iran's accelerated uranium enrichment
thread.title_full: Ground News - West condemns Iran's accelerated uranium enrichment

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - West condemns Iran's accelerated uranium enrichment
text:
Summary by Ground News Britain, France, Germany and the US said they "condemn this measure that further aggravates the continued escalation of the Iranian nuclear programme" The statement came two days after the International Atomic Energy Agency released a report saying Iran "increased its production of highly enriched uranium, reversing a previous output reduction from mid-2023" Share menu More
Filters 16 Articles 16 Articles All Left Center Right
Hindustan Times Center Low Factuality Independent: HT Media ‘No credible civilian justification’: West condemns Iran's high uranium enrichment The statement came two days after the International Atomic Energy Agency released a report saying Iran "increased its production of highly enriched uranium.
2 hours ago · New Delhi, India Read Full Article
Hindustan Times Center Low Factuality Independent: HT Media
‘No credible civilian justification’: West condemns Iran's high uranium enrichment The statement came two days after the International Atomic Energy Agency released a report saying Iran "increased its production of highly enriched uranium.
2 hours ago · New Delhi, India Read Full Article The Straits Times Lean Right Mixed Factuality Media Conglomerate: Singapore Press Holdings France, Germany, UK, US, condemn Iran's increase in uranium enrichment France, Germany, Britain and the United States condemned Iran's increase in production of highly enriched uranium following the IAEA report from earlier this week. Read more at straitstimes.com.

3 hours ago · Singapore Read Full Article Adevarul Statele Unite, Regatul Unit, Franţa şi Germania condamnă în comun creșterea producţiei de uraniu îmbogăţit a Iranului Statele Unite, Regatul Unit, Franţa şi Germania au condamnat într-o declaraţie comună sporirea de către Iran a producţiei de uraniu îmbogăţit, confirmată de un raport publicat marţi de Agenţia Internaţională pentru Energie Atomică (AIEA)
